name: Beach US Car Challenge 18
description:
Beach US Car Challenge 18 is the Beach Car Racing, the free driving game. This ultimate beach surfing game is best for real water boat lovers who got some amazing boat driving stunts on water simulation.

Features:
Daring destructive high speed racing
Realistic vehicle destruction, accidents and damage
Real car physics and smooth driving control
Variety of excellent vehicles and heavy trucks
Driving the practical experience of cars & trucks
Smooth Controls, Tools & Hydraulic Brakes
Amazingly beautiful 3D environment and sound effects
